overview:
Since joining PacketExchange as Chief Operating Officer in 2005, Mike Ing has taken over the day to day running of the business operations, with responsibility for hitting the end to end business goals. Prior to joining PacketExchange, Mike worked for Level 3 Communications, where he held a number of senior posts, spending 2 years working in the HQ in Denver, Colorado, running the Global Customer Services function, playing a key role in the integration of acquisitions, and running the softswitch engineering group. Mike returned to Europe in 2004 to run European Operations.

Prior to working for Level 3, Mike worked for Cable and Wireless in the field of submarine cables, leading the team responsible for engineering, procuring and delivering major cable systems world wide. Mike is a graduate in Electrical and Electronic Engineering, with further qualifications in Telecomms from Essex University and in management from INSEAD.
